title: Alice in wonderland
creator_credit: Nick Willing, Dyson Lovell, Babelsberg International Film Produktion and Hallmark Entertainment
brief_description: After running away from home, Alice steps into a rabbit hole and enters an incredible magical world full of adventure. Originally produced for television, this adaptation of the Lewis Carroll classic features an impressive cast and special effects from Frame Store and Jim Henson’s Creature Shop. Cast includes Robbie Coltrane, Whoopi Goldberg, Ben Kingsley, Christopher Lloyd, Martin Short and many more.
